title: LFM Wanting To Build Up a Team Silver 1 ++
body:
Hey Guys

i am wanting to make up a team silver 1 ++ with active players who pretty much on almost every night and wanna team up with rank ups / dynamic que. i am wanting players who want to improve and learn together and help each other out. i want players who can communicate fairly algood skill and learn from mistakes and enchance there skills. i am usely on everynight around 5pm onwards aussie time. rdy to play. if ya keen then add me in game or leave a comment and ill get back to ya. 

Looking For All Roles Apart From Jungle.

replies.body: chuck me an invite im top and jungle main. silver 5 atm
